title: Double Feature Drive In When The Clock Strikes & Walking Target

sources.title: Double Feature Drive In When The Clock Strikes Walking Target
sources.description: Now Playing: 2 Edward L. Cahn directed Drama/Noir classic films from the 60s., "When the Clock Strikes" and "The Walking Target". Retro Cartoon Short "In My Merry Oldsmobile (1931)" When the Clock Strikes (1961) UNRATED - Directed by Edward L. Cahn , with James Brown , Merry Anders , Henry Corden A condemned criminal's acquaintances gather at a remote lodge on the eve of his execution to search for hidden money. The Walking Target (1960) RATED APPROVED - Directed by Edward L. Cahn , with Joan Evans , Ron Foster , Merry Anders An ex-con sets out to find the money which was hidden after a payroll robbery but is persuaded to turn it over to the police by his former accomplice's widow.
